a loving sidelong glance

3211.33.text:
- And then the one dressed
in red with the glowing sword

3215.22.text:
will make it like you,
just amble up very quickly

3219.07.text:
He seems to have as easy a
time scaling up this ice hill.

3231.70.text: - He's not wearing any metal armor.

3233.75.text:
- Oh okay, when you said
visor, I was kind of assuming--

3236.26.text:
- Just a visor and then
the cloaks and the robes.

3239.85.text:
- He's wearing a vizier,
just kind of right there.

3247.74.text:
- Then he pulls something
out that looks like a sphere

3254.62.text: and just sort of tosses it up the wall.

3258.90.text:
- A glowing sphere, like
an orb of some sort?

3261.61.text: - I was definitely pulling an orb vibe.

3263.75.text:
- And the orb sort of
explodes in front of the giant

3268.32.text:
- I was just thinking you
were doing a really good job.

3270.69.text: - All right, and then it is

3273.06.text:
the rest of the Dran team
is making their way up,

3277.44.text: roughly at the same pace you are,
